song.title: Lift up your heads, behold the one true light
song.lyrics:
[C] Lift up your heads, behold the one true light â€“ here is the Christ, here is the Prince of Peace. Lift up your hearts, receive the gift of mercy. Our Savior comes, our Savior dwells with us.
[V1] Jesus Christ, the Son of God made Man among his own, comes to make a home. Come and see, behold Emmanuel, He is with us, the Word of God made flesh.
[V2] Come o Lord! Your temple is made ready. Your word is food, our hearts will take their fill. Speak o Lord! Your servants come to hear, Your children Lord, your children Lord are we.
